Class.name: Report.INReqLine
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INReqLine.Company as INReqLine_Company,SQLUser.INReq.Company as INReq_Company,SQLUser.INReqLine.ReqNumber,SQLUser.INReqLine.LineNumber,SQLUser.INReqLine.Item,SQLUser.INReqLine.Unit,SQLUser.WWW101.ParameterDescription,SQLUser.WWW101.Language1,SQLUser.WWW101.SearchItem,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyOrdered,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyRequired,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyToReceive,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyReceived,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyToIssue,SQLUser.INReqLine.QtyIssued,SQLUser.INReq.ToLocn,SQLUser.INReqLine.FromStockLocn as FromLocn,SQLUser.INReq.ReqNum as HeaderReqNum from SQLUser.INReqLine,SQLUser.WWW101,SQLUser.INReq where (WWW101.ParameterDescription = 'EINHEIT') and (WWW101.SearchItem = INReqLine.Unit) and (INReq.ReqNum = INReqLine.ReqNumber) and (INReq.Company = INReqLine.Company)
